module.name: Ft.Lib.Set
module.description: Copyright 2005 Fourthought, Inc. (USA). Detailed license and copyright information: http://4suite.org/COPYRIGHT Project home, documentation, distributions: http://4suite.org/

function.name: Intersection
function.description: Return the intersection of the two sets as a new set (i.e., all the elements that are in both sets).

function.name: Not
function.description: Return the difference of the two sets as a new set (i.e., all the elements from set a that are not in set b).

function.name: Union
function.description: Return the union of the two sets as a new set (i.e., all the elements that are in either set).

function.name: Unique
function.description: Return a new set with any duplicates removed.
